product_name: The North Face Manaslu Insulated Gloves
long_description: When you're walking the dog or driving into work on a cold winter morning, The North Face Manaslu insulated gloves will keep your hands warm with plush polyester fleece and synthetic insulation. 300-weight polyester fleece combines with Heatseeker(TM) insulation to keep your hands warm during your day-to-day winter activities. Heatseeker(TM) insulation offers a great warmth-to-weight ratio, is highly compressible and is extremely durable, making it ideal for cold weather. 5 Dimensional Fit(TM) uses 5 measurements of the hand to construct gloves with an accurate and consistent fit. Radiametric Articulation(TM) improves warmth and blood flow to your fingers by mirroring the natural relaxed curve of the hand. Nylon Taslan(R) fabric over the knuckles and backs of fingers improves durability. Synthetic grip palms ensure you have a good hold of the dog leash or steering wheel. The North Face Manaslu Insulated gloves have elastic at the wrists to seal out cold air and snow.
short_description: When you're walking the dog or driving into work on a cold winter morning, The North Face Manaslu insulated gloves will keep your hands warm with plush polyester fleece and synthetic insulation.
